11.content:
Name: Scott Allen
Age: 16
Height: 5ft 11 inch
Gender:
Interests: Video games, Sports, Computer programming
Personality: Shy, caring

Were Form: Wereshark
Height: 13 ft 6 inch
Ability: Blood Rage - Allows him to move faster for a brief amount of time
11.title: Scott Allen

111.content: You were just walking down a street. You were always a bit shy which made it hard for you to make friends. You always thought you might say something stupid or embarassing. Your lived on the outskirts of a city. There was beach past your side of the outskirts. Though you just stay at home most of the time. You looked at the sunset. You continued walking.
111.title: Start

choices: You were in an odd holding cell
1111.content:
You then felt a sharp pain in your back. You then reached towards your back & found it was a tranquiliser dart. You then started feeling drowsy as you fell to your knees. You then looked up as two men wearing black came. You then blacked out.

You had soon started waking up. You had a headache for some reason. You heard some voices but your vision was blurry. "...not working?" someone said. "We are.. all we can. A mind... not controllable. May set in... transformation," someone else said. You then stood up & your senses returned to normal. You still had that headache though. You looked around & saw...
1111.title: Something happens

11111.content: You looked & you were in an odd holding cell. It was similar to a a jail cell about 8 ft from floor to the roof. But the room outside had a ton of scientific equipment & a high roof to make room for the larger equipment. There were also four tesla coils on each corner of the room. You went to the cell bars & looked up at the roof. Looking up made your headache worse but you thought you were in some sort of warehouse. You saw some hangar doors at the other end of the warehouse. You then saw two men outside your cell. "Umm hello?" you asked nervously. You got no response from them. "... Can yous hear me?" you asked him. "Shut up! We are focusing," one of them said. You remained quiet for a bit.
11111.title: You were in an odd holding cell

111111.content: You watched as they just worked on the computer. You decided to just ignore them. It was obvious they weren't going to help you. You went to the centre of the cell & lied down. "Okay its ready to use now," one of the men said. You then had looked up at the breifly & they were fiddling with the equipment outside. You then got to your feet & looked at them. "Initiating now," one man said as he hit a button. The tesla coils around you started flickering purple electricity. "What the!?" you said looking at them. The electricity from them suddenly shifted into you. You were in alot of pain from it. You then fell to your knees. It felt like your insides were were being wringed out. You then saw something odd. Your skin was going dark grey. You saw black claws come out of your fingernails. You then saw something coming out of your wrists. It appeared to shark fins. You then let groan of pain as it felt like your bones were changing. Only it didn't sound like you. It sounded rougher. You felt something grow out your back. You looked to see it was a large fin. You also had a large shark like tail. You then felt yourself growing for some reason. You saw that you were getting thick with muscle but you were growing. By the time you stopped growing, you appeared to be 13 ft 6 inch. "What did you do?" you said in a rough voice. "You will obey us & fight for us," one man said. "Why should I?" you said to them with a glare, "You made me into this & I dont find that fair." You then saw the other man whisper something to him.
111111.title: Scott the Wereshark

1111111.content: You watched them as they talked. You needed a way to get out of the jail cell. You had a rough idea on how to do it. You looked into a reflective surface & saw that your head now resembled a sharks head. You looked at the bars you then turned yourself & started kicking the bars of the cell out. This got the attention of the scientists. "Dont do that!" one yelled. You just smiled & continued kicking them out. A scientist picked up a radio & said, "This is Aqua cell. we are having a security breach... All the other cells have had breaches too!?" He then got a Pistol just as you got out. You then kicked the pistol out of his hand & slammed them to the wall with your tail. They then looked at you with fear. "Pathetic," you said as you walked towards the hangar door.
1111111.title: Escape!

11111111.content: You walked outside & saw you were at some docks. It appeared to be deserted. You then walked over to the edge of the docks & sat down looking at the water. "I will never be able to go back home like this," you thought staring at the water. You put your feet in the water. It felt refreshing & comfortable. You then stood up & stared at the water. You turned to leave.
11111111.title: Outside

111111111.content: You stopped for a minute & looked back to the ocean. You thought about how it made you comfortable. You then turned back & saw a large werewolf staring at you. "Oh man!!" you said as you ran at him & tackled him to the ground & pinned him. "Gah!" he said sounding afraid. You then looked into his blue eyes & saw fear. "Dont hurt me," he said closing his eyes. Oops, you thought embaressed. "Were you human?" you asked embarassed. "Y-yes I was," he said nervously. You then got off & stepped back a bit. You looked down & said, "... Sorry." "Its ok... I dont blame you," he said getting to his feet. You then looked down shyly. "I am not much of a people person," you said shyly, ".. I stick to computer games & laser skirmish." "In all honesty I'm not much of a people person eather," he replied, "...I generaly hide behind games." "Yeah," you said still shy, "...I have a like for altering games temporally. Have you tried an Aussult rifle that shoots rockets in Halo?" He then looked at you. "They have that?" he asked. "If you have the right programs you can alter a map with various codes & ... I will stop talking." You are such a nerd Scott, you thought. "Why? I'm interested in that sort of thing," he said. "Umm ok. You have a Transfer cable & there are various fanmade alteration programs designed for mapping & modding," you said. "Hmm thats cool," he said scratching his chin. "Anyway, my name is Scott," you said. "Nice to meet you Scott," he said, "My name is Donald." "Good to meet you," you said. You then looked over yourself. You body looked muscly & terrifying. "I cant go home now," you said sadly as you sat down. "Why did they do this to us?" he said angrily, "Its not fair!!" He then punched a wall which demolished it. "Yeah I know," you said thinking about your family, "We are practically outcasts because of this. But what will we do?" He then looked at the warehouses. "If they where planing to use us as weapons, they would need a cover up," he said. Yeah.. I think thats the case," you said, "The abandoned docks are a..." You were interrupted by your thoughts. "I just had an idea," you said smiling. "What is it?" he said looking at you. "Its obvious we cant live at home," you said looking at a warehouse, "But what about here?" "That could work," he replied. "Yeah lets go," you said walking towards the warehouse with Donald following.
111111111.title: Donald the Werewolf

1111111111.content:
You and Donald walked into the Warehouse and looked around. “I think this is the warehouse where I was being held,” you said. “Looks like the people have fled,” Donald said as he looked around. “Yeah it seems,” you replied, “We can use their equipment for survival. It’s gonna be like minecraft haha.” “Haha you play that too?” he asked when he looked around. “Yeah. I have it on my laptop at home,” you said, “I wish I could either get a new laptop or get my laptop.” “Hmm,” Donald said as he looked at an old computer. “What is it?” you asked. He turned on the computer. “This still works… A little old though,” he said as he was looking at the computer. “But if you haven’t noticed,” you said as you put a finger half the size of the computer on it, “We are too big to use it.” “I know but I’m just curious,” he said as he attempted to type with his claw.

You watched him as he typed on the computer. “Let’s see you see anything we might find interesting... Maybe what they were doing?” he said as he looked. “Ok,” you said as you then pointed to a file with the name “Were army”, “That should say it.” “Right,” Donald said as he clicked the file. You saw a lot of code on the file. “Hmmm,” he said looking at it. “It’s an encrypted file. They must have decryption software on this computer,” you said. “Hmm ok,” Donald said as he started looking on the computer, “Pascal Class don’t fail me now.” You then started looking around. “Here we go,” Donald say as he found a program and he started it up. You then picked up a pistol. “This would be useless haha,” you said. Donald looked at you. “Haha you think if they were doing this they would beef up security measures,” he replied. “Yeah I would think that,” you said thinking, “Maybe our size was not what they expected.” “Yeah,” he said, “Even if they could “Control us”, how would they be able to cover it?” “Maybe night ops,” you said, “Think about it. Hardly anyone is on the streets at night” “Yeah maybe,” he said looking at the computer, “Darn DOS is so slow.” “It looks like windows Vista,” you said, “XP is a lot better because of the performance. Vista takes up too much RAM.” “Yeah Vista is stupid. It just looks pretty and nothing more,” he said as you then scratch your head, “We're geeks aren’t we?” “I think so haha,” you laughed, “Haha well at least there is common ground.” He then looked at the computer. “Finally,” he said as he looked at the file. You put the pistol down & walked over.

“What is it?” you asked. “Something about Experimental Lycanthropy,” he said as he read it, “Looks like they were seeing if an unwilling mind could be controlled since they only had a few trys.” “Oh. So they were going to have a control on us,” you said, “I may have heard something when I woke up. I had a large headache so I don’t remember what they said” “Same here. But apparently it failed not just for use but whoever else was here,” Donald said. “So I wonder how though. But I never thought this was possible though,” you said as you punched your chest hard not feeling anything. “Well it goes into detail but I can't understand this except it takes a ton of power to pull off,” he said as he read on. “Yeah,” you said, “That Purple electricity. Dose it mention anything about it?” “Yep,” he said as he kept looking, “I can't help the feeling that there is some sort of off switch to this.” “What do you mean?” you asked. “Well what if the government was to investigate them. I don't think they would take this lightly,” Donald said as he gestured to himself and you, “Especially at this size.” “Your right,” you said, “I wonder if we can control it?” “I wonder too,” he said as he rub his eyes, “This is killing my eyes having to squint like this.” “I might try transforming back,” you said as you closed your eyes.…
1111111111.title: In the warehouse

11111111111.content:
You then felt yourself surging with purple electricity. “Whoa,” you heard Donald say. You were changing back to human. You also felt your clothing reform on you. “Am I human again?” you asked as you opened your eyes. “Yes,” Donald said as he kneeled down. “We may be able to go home after all,” you said happily. “Maybe,” Donald replied. Just then you heard a car park outside. “Uh oh,” Donald said. 6 troopers in black then ran into the warehouse. You grabbed the pistol that was on the table and pointed it at them. “Surrender and you will be unharmed,” one of the troopers said. “What’s going on?” Donald asked. “We are part of an organization called Lycans return. Do you surrender?” another asked. “What will you do if I do?” Donald asked. “We can guarantee your safety and you will be given a new life,” the trooper said. “Lycans Return is the group who runs this operation,” you whispered as you looked at the computer. Donald then glared at them. “Follow my lead,” he whispered as you place your pistol on the table. “What now?” Donald asked. “You come with us,” a trooper said, “Go into your human form.” You then looked at Donald. He has got an idea, you thought. “Ok I ahh,” Donald said as he took a deep breath, “Ahhhh Choooo!” He then blew over the Troopers and he grabbed a metal plate. “Get ready!” Donald said as he held the plate like it was a barricade to cover you and Scott. You took the pistol off the table & peeked around the metal plate & aimed down the sight then shot a trooper with a shotgun in the head. “Right between the eyes!” you said as you got back behind cover. “Ok,” Donald said as he peeked around the plate. Two troopers with assault rifles start to shooting at him. “Gah!” he said as he got back behind cover. You then felt a power welling up inside of you. “Grrrrr…” you growled. You then dashed out from behind cover. Everything felt slow to you. “Feel the blood rage!” you yelled. You then shot 4 troopers consecutively. You dashed at the last one & gave him a nasty pistol whip to the face.

You felt everyhing returning to normal. “W-wow,” you heard Donald say. “I have no clue how I did that?” you said suprised. Donald then put the metal plate down & closed his eyes. “Must have been something they did,” he said as he flickered with purple electricity. “I don’t know,” you said, “I felt a power inside me. It felt like everything was slowing down.” Donald was then back in his normal form. “Well we should get out of here,” Donald said. “Wait. I just had a thought,” you said, “They know who we are. We should probably stay here.” “I guess you’re right,” Donald said as he scratched his head. “I am just thinking because they could come after our family,” you said, “They probably have been gathering intelligence on us. If we go back it could be an excuse for them to use our family as leverage.” “Couldn’t they do that anyway?” Donald asked. “They probably wouldn't want to risk exposure unless we are there,” you said as you looked around at all the scientific equipment, “How much do you think this is worth?” “Probably a lot for the right person,” Donald replied as he looked around. “Yeah. We are probably worth thousands now. Maybe even hundreds of thousands,” you said. “So I’m guessing they will keep after us,” Donald said thinking, “Probably use any means to get us.” “Yes we will have be ready,” you said.
11111111111.title: Human Again?

111111111111.content:
You walked over to a desk & started looking in it. “What are you looking for?” Donald asked. “Don’t know,” you replied as you looked through the drawer, “Just salvage… yay.” You had found 8 pistol magazines. “Hmm,” he said as he walked over to the troopers and gathered their guns, “Might as well keep these handy.” “Yeah. Defense never hurts,” you said as you found a silencer for the pistol. “Hmm, how should we carry these?” Donald asked holding all of the guns. You shrugged and said, “Maybe we should get a jacket or something.” “Hmm ok," he replied as he grabbed an ammo clip off a trooper, “Eww what is this?” You looked & saw it was an ammo clip for a sniper rifle. “That’s an ammo clip,” you said looking over at him, “Looks like it’s for a sniper rifle.” “Ok then,” he replied as kept looking for more clips. The pistol you had reminded you of James Bond. You then started thinking about Lycans Return. “Something up?” Donald asked. “Just thinking about stuff,” you said, “Who are these people & what are they planning. But I get the feeling that the less we know the better.” “Yeah I guess so,” Donald said as he ran to the hanger door and looked outside, “Hmm.”

“I guess we will just have to survive,” you said following him, “Do you want to go for a swim?” “That sounds fun,” he said as you look around. “Are you ok?” you asked. “Just a bit cautious,” he replied. “Ok,” you said as you focused. Purple electricity appeared on you as you changed into your Wereshark form. You then dived into the water and made a huge splash. You then peeked your head up. “Hahaha are you going to join the shark in the water?” you asked him. “Haha I might,” he said as he walked to the edge of the water. He started to crackle with purple electricity as he started to change to his werewolf form. “Here I go,” he said as he jumped into the water. He then came back up. “COLD!!” he yelled. “Hahahaha” you laughed as you swam to him. “Cold cold cold very cold,” he said half laughing. “Haha it’s not cold to me,” you laughed. “Haha I wouldn't doubt that. You’re a shark this is your element,” he said. “Haha I suppose,” you said as you splashed him. “Haha hey,” he said as he splashed you back. You then dived under the water. You then came up behind him & splashed him. “Haha Hey!” he said as he turned around. “Haha Attack of Scott,” you said as you made a huge splash with your tail. “Haha hey!” Donald laughed. “Haha that was fun.” you said as you climbed out of the water. “Haha yeah,” Donald say as he climbed out.He shook the water off him & his fur poofed out & he looked fluffy. “Donald…,” you said giggling, “Your fur looks fluffy.” “So it is,” he said as he looked at himself. “Haha You’re so soft and fluffy,” you laughed as you felt his arm. “Haha yeah,” he laughed back.

You then heard your stomach growl. “I wonder what time is it?” you asked. “Sounds like we need to find some food,” he replied. “Yeah I think so,” you said “I think we should go get some food. We may have to steal it though.” He then looked to the ground with a worried look on his face. “It’s the only way,” you said, “Going out in the day would be like a target on us.” “I know, but it doesn’t feel right,” Donald replied. “It is the only way,” you said, “The only other way is… let’s not say it.” “I know…” he said as he sat down “Just don’t to become a convict in the process.” “I know…,” you replied, “But it’s the only way we can survive.” “(sigh) Why did it have to be us?” Donald said as he clenched his fist in anger, “It’s not fair!!!” “I know…” you replied, “But let’s just get something to eat then worry about it. “Ok” he said as he calmed down. “Let’s go.” you said as you walked to the exit of the docks. Donald followed you slowly.
111111111111.title: Go exploring

11111112.content: Just when you were about to head out a few men in suits came running in armed with shotguns. They take aim and fire their guns at you but the bullets barely affect you. One of the men takes the butt of his shot gun and hits you upside the head with. You growl and look back at them with an angry looking face and start baring your razor sharp teeth "oh s**t, bad move" the guy says while looking at you in fear.
11111112.title: something almost stops you from leaving

1113.content: How does Scott become a were-shark?
1113.title: Birth of the were-shark.

12.content:
Name:Shane Tutty
Age: 16
Height: 5ft 8inch
Gender: Male
Interests: Video games, Animals, Drawing
Personality: Shy, nervous, cautious

Were Form: WereIguana
Height: 13 ft 2 inch
Ability: Camoflauge - Can change skin colour and pattern to blend into background.
12.title: Shane Tutty

121.content: I was sitting on a bench in the middle of the park.There were a bunch of kids from my school not too far from were I was sitting.My anxieties prevented me from going over to them, even if I wanted to.I got up and began to walk home.I walked down an empty street and the weather began to get bad as the wind picked up and the rain lashed down.
121.title: Start

choices: I was in a bizzare holding cell
1211.content:
I felt a sharp sting in the back of my neck I put my hand back and found it was a tranquilizer dart.I began to feel dizzy and drowsy and I collapsed to my knees.I looked up to see two men in black attire staring at me.I then became unconscious.

I soon began to wake up but I had a headache and my hearing was impared. There were people talking but I was unable to make out what they were saying.I stood up and my hearing was coming back.My headache was still there.I looked around and I saw...
1211.title: Something happens

12111.content: I looked and saw I was in a bizarre holding cell.There were multiple machines in the room outside.The room was dimly lit except for the glow of the machines.I guessed I was in a warehouse from the size of the building.There were two large doors,one each side of the warehouse which made me guess I was in a hangar.There were four tesla coils on each corner of the cell.I heard two men speaking outside the cell."Hello" I said anxiously.They seemed to ignore me.I spoke again my voice slightly raised."Be quiet!"One of them said "We are trying to think" I remained quiet and stepped back from bars of the cell.
12111.title: I was in a bizarre holding cell

121111.content:
I sat and watched as they worked on various machines.I just sat in the middle of the cell wondering what was going to happen to me."We`re ready to begin now" One of the men said."Ready to begin what?" I thought as I got to my feet.
"Initiating now" The second man said as he pressed a button on a machine.The four tesla coils began to flicker with purple electricity.The electricity jolted into me.I felt a sudden pain and fell to my knees.My insides felt like they were going to explode.I then saw something weird.My skin began to become covered in black scales.Black claws extended from my fingers.They also tore out of my shoes forming from my toes.A tail extended from my backside.I felt my bones shifting which caused me to make an inhuman groan.I felt a weird sensation as my eyes became lizard eyes,my pupils became slits.My jaws extended and my teeth became sharp.I felt spines emerge from my back.They ran from my neck to the beginning of my tail.I glanced out of my cell and read of a computer Monitor "Fusing subject with D.N.A of Galapagos Marine Iguana"When I believed the transformation had ended.I felt my body begin to grow.It stopped at what I guessed was over 13 ft in height.This forced me onto all fours.My tail proceded to lengthen until it was half my new height."What did you do to me?" I asked,my voice sounded deeper and stern."You will now obey us and you will fight for us" One of the men said. I replied "Do you really think I would do anything for you after you made me into this....this monster?" They then began whispering to each other.
121111.title: Shane the WereIguana

1211111.content: They continued to whisper just out of earshot.I looked at the cell and began thinking of a way to escape.I put my hand to my head because I still had a headache.I was careful as my claws were sharp.Then a thought came to mind "Wait my claws are sharp and my arms feel strong and Marine Iguana`s make their nests in burrows" I put my thought to action and began digging under the bars."Stop that!" One of the men yelled.I dug a deep trench under the bars and crawled through it.I whipped my tail at the first man causing him to be sent through the air crashing into an old computer system.The second man picked up a radio "This is Amphibian Cell.We have a securiy breach....What!?All the other cells have had breaches too!"I leapt at him and pinned him to the ground with my feet.He was knocked out from the force.I head towards the hangar doors.
1211111.title: Try to Escape

choices: Wait and see if anything happens before getting out
12111111.content: I walked out to see I was in a dock with multiple warehouses.I walked to the edge of a pier and gazed at my reflection in the water."I look like a monster, I dont know what to do I cant go anywhere like this especially home"I look around the dock area to see most of it is relatively abandoned."Guess I could stay around here for awhile, but not on land its not safe here with those people around" I look at my reflection again."I am a Marine Iguana, guess that means I can have a semi-aquatic lifestlye, I can catch fish and maybe find a small inlet or a large sewer pipe to live in"I leap into the water.It is cool and refreshing.It is then I notice that my hands and feet are webbed and each of the spines running down my back that are in the same row are connected by webbing.It gives the impression that I have two small sails running down my back.My tail aids me in swimming along.I stick my head out of the water and decide to...
12111111.title: Outside

choices: Try to get into a warehouse
121111111.content: I look towards the warehouses and decide to get out and maybe find some answers.Before I get out I see a Tiger on the roof of a warehouse,It sees me aswell."That might be another experiment" Just before I got out of the water I hear the engine of an approaching vehicle, and see an SUV with a insignia on the hood of it, a head of a howling wolf. Then it stops between the warehouse and the docks and two men get out "I thought I saw something by the water." One said "I saw something on the roof of the warehouse." said the other "Hurry up and investigate, it could be those escaped test subjects." said a third still inside the car. I quickly retreat back under the out of eyesight from the guards. "What can I do now?"
121111111.title: Wait and see if anything happens before getting...

1211111112.content: I stay in the water as a trooper walks over to the waters edge, he peers into the water.Thankfully he couldnt make me out in the water."Nothing over here,just a dolphin"he said joining the other two.Another replied "Ok we`ll just wait here for backup, just patrol the area for now" One trooper stays by the car,the second walks closer to the warehouses but doesnt enter and the third stands by the pier.What should I do?
1211111112.title: Stay in the water

12111111121.content: I grab the trooper standing by the water with my tail and pull him under.I keep him under until he becomes unconscious, which doesnt take long.The trooper by the car comes over to investigate "Hey,where`d you go?" He notices the ripples in the water.I grab him by the throat with my arm as I stand out of the water up onto the pier.He too loses consciousness not after long.I drop him and release the other trooper onto the pier.The last trooper aims his rifle at me. "You can still be of use to us, surrender and I will let you live" he says. I reply "Fine,I surrender" He walks closer never lowering his rifle.He stops within arms reach of me.I swing my arm at him and he is knocked into the car.He leaves an impression on it."K.O" I say walking towards him.I grab him and the two others and drop them into a moored boat.I sever the link tieing the boat to the dock and get into the water and start pushing it.I get it half way into the bay and I let it go.I head back to the warehouses and see that the troopers back up had arrived and had entered a warehouse.Moments later I hear gunshots.No troopers exit the warehouse "Guess there was an experiment in there" I thought.What next?
12111111121.title: Attack

121111111211.content:
The bay looked pretty amazing from under water.It looked even better with the lights of the city shining onto the water.
I see a boat that was occupied by a few young adults that were drinking.One of them started throwing his empty cans into the water.Another said "Dont do that, its bad for the local marine life".The one who continued throwing the cans in replied "So what, its not like the marine life will do anyhing about it" I picked up all the cans and threw them all back onto the boat.Everyone on the boat was confused.I shot out of the water and hauled myself onto the end of the boat.
There was a moment of silence on the boat. I growled "The marine life doesnt care much for people like you, dont let me catch you dumping here again otherwise my diet will change from fish to meat!" I then jump back into the water.
I swim to the depth of the bay.From above I hear?
121111111211.title: Explore the Bay

1211111112111.content: I hear what sounds like sirens and I swim to the top of the water and see two police cars are at a dock, not the one I came from.Whoever they were chasing got into a speed boat and took off. The crook was speeding towards my direction.When the boat was above me I stuck my claws into its hull and quickly sunk my teeth into the motor.I ripped it of then bit chunks from the hull and swam off as a police chopper hovered above the sinking boat.I swam back towards the warehouses.I get out onto the pier and look around.I dont see anyone so I presume its safe.Just then?
1211111112111.title: Sirens

12111111121111.content: I hid under the waves, unsure of who it was. a large shape became visible, it wandered along the shore. I decided I oculd take whatever it was. I pounced and saw it was
12111111121111.title: Someone Comes

13.content:

Age: 19
Height: 5 ft. 11 inch

Personality: Friendly, Quiet

13.title: Donald Mason

131.content: You are walking by a river on a normal day. You were a friendly kind of person but you were afraid of people. You tend to hide this fact by being very quiet around others and often lose yourself in thought as a means of blocking stuff out. As you look at your phone you start making your way home, since it's getting late. Then...
131.title: Start

choices: You are in a strange holding cell.
1311.content:
As you are walking you then start to feel a sharp pain in your back. You feel your back and you pull out a tranquillizer dart. You then start feeling sleepy and you fall over on the ground. Just before you black out you look and see two dark figures walking towards you. You then lose consciousness.
Before long you began to wake up. Your head was spinning and you couldn’t see a thing. You then hear voices. “…what are you saying?” One voice says. Another voice speaks “We are… to fix this. There… trouble... his mind… may resolve… transformation.” As your senses start to return to you lift yourself to your feet and you look around to see…
1311.title: Something happends

13111.content: You notice you are in some kind of holding cell. The cell wasn’t all unusual, just about what you would expect. However on the outside you could see lots of scientific equipment and devices. You notice 4 large tesla coils at the corners of the room. As you look around more you notice you are in a large ware house seeing a tall roof and two large hanger doors at the end. You then notice two scientists working just outside of your cell. “Umm e-excuse me?” You say in a quiet voice. They ignore you so you try to speak a little louder “Umm Excuse me, Sir?” “You, quiet down and let us work!” one of the men snaps at you. You back away and sit quietly. Then…
13111.title: You are in a strange holding cell.

131111.content: You sit quietly as you watched them work. You then start to ignore them and try to block them out. They weren’t going to help you any time soon. You go over to the center of the cell and sit down. “There the last of the preparations are done.” One of the men says. You look over to them and stand up as you see them messing with something outside. “Beginning now.” One of the men says as he hits a button. You notice the tesla coils start to glow with purple electricity. “What’s going on!?” you shout in fear. Then the electricity then jumps to your body. You shout in pain as you fall to your knees. Your insides felt like they were being wrung out. You then start to notice you are changing. You see you are starting to grow grey fur from your skin. Black claws are starting to grow from your fingers and you notice paw pads start to form on your hands. Your face starts to form into a muscle and your ears move to the top of. Your legs start to change in form. You feel a tail start to grow as well, and it grows long and brush like. Your voice sound rough as you groan in pain. You then start to grow bigger and your muscles start to tone a little. You stopped growing at a little more than 13 feet and your body is tough but not too much. “What did you do to me!” you yell at them in a rough low voice. “You are going to obey us and fight for us.” One of the men says. “I don’t want to fight for you.” You shout “Just because you turn me into this doesn’t mean I have to listen to you.” The men start talking to themselves. You then…
131111.title: Donald the Werewolf

1311111.content: As they talked you started looking around trying to find a way out. You maneuver yourself in the cramped cage and you start kicking the bars out (Considering the experiment they really should have made a stronger cage. The men notice you are trying to escape. “Hey cut that out!” the man shouts. “Make me.” You say as you stick out your tongue as you keep kicking out the bars. “This is Lupes cell we have a situation…” one of the men says into a radio “…What do you mean the other cells are breached!” The man grabs a gun and aims it at you as you crawl out. You easily knock the gun from his hand and you force him agents the wall. As you final stand up you see them shaking. “Jerks.” You mumble as you walk over to the hanger doors…
1311111.title: Escape!

13111111.content: You open the hanger doors and you look around. You seem to be and an abandon docks. You slip between two of the warehouses and sit down to hide. “How can I go home like this.” You mumble as you look around. You look out to the ocean and listen to the waves. The waves seem to calm you dispite your situation. You then get up and you prepare to leave. Then…
13111111.title: Outside

131111111.content: You walk through the docks just trying to figure out what to do. Just then you notice a large wereshark looking at the ocean. “Is that one of the other I heard about on the radio?” You think as you look at him. Just then the shark looks at you. “Oh man!!” you hear him say as he runs to you and tackles you to the ground. “Gah!” you say sounding afraid. You look at him in fear. “Don’t hurt me.” You say closing your eyes. “Were you human?” he asks you sounding embarrassed. “Y-yes I was.” You reply nervously. He then got off of you and stepped back a little bit. “…sorry.” He says looking down. “It’s ok… I don’t blame you.” You reply as you get to your feet. You could tell that the shark was shy by the way he was acting. “I am not much of a people person.” He says shyly “… I stick to computer games and laser skirmish.” You then start to gain your voice noticing a common link you can use. "In all honesty I'm not much of a people person either." You reply “… I generally hide behind games.” “Yeah.” He says still a shy "...I have a like for altering games temporally. Have you tried an Assault rifle that shoots rockets in Halo?" “They have that?” you asked intrigued. "If you have the right programs you can alter a map with various codes & ... I will stop talking." Scott suddenly stopped. You tilt your head wondering why he stopped. "Why? I'm interested in that sort of thing." You say. "Umm ok. You have a Transfer cable & there are various fan made alteration programs designed for mapping & modding." He finishes. “Hmm that’s cool.” You say scratching your chin (Or the wolf equivalent of one.). “Anyway my name is Scott.” He says. “Nice to meet you Scott.” You reply “My name is Donald.” “Good to meet you.” He replies. You then look at yourself. “I can’t go home now.” He said sadly as he sat down. You start getting mad seeing that this has cause someone else misery. “Why did they do this to us?” you say with anger. “It’s not fair!!” Out of anger you punch a wall which collapses like it’s nothing. “Yeah I know.” Scott says “We are practically outcasts because of this. But what will we do?" You then look at the warehouses in thought. "If they were planning to use us as weapons, they would need a cover up." You say thinking out loud. “Yeah… I think that’s the case.” He says “The abandon docks are a… I just had an idea.” He said smiling. “What is it.” You ask looking at him. “It’s obvious we can’t live at home.” He said looking at the warehouses “But what about here?” “That could work.” You reply. “Yeah lets go.” He says walking to the warehouses. You follow behind Scott not too far behind. Then…
131111111.title: Scott the Wereshark

1311111111.content:
You and Scott walk into the Warehouse and look around. “I think this is the warehouse where I was being held. “ Scott says. “Looks like the people have fled. “You say as you look around. “Yeah it seems.” Scott replies “We can use their equipment for survival. It’s gonna be like minecraft haha.” “Haha you play that too?” you ask when you look around. “Yeah. I have it on my laptop at home.” Scott says “I wish I could either get a new laptop or get my laptop.” “Hmm.” You say as you look at an old computer. “What is it?” Scott asks. You turn on the computer. “This still works… A little old though.” You say as you squint looking at the computer. “But if you haven’t noticed.” Scott says as he puts a huge finger on the computer. “We are too big to use it.” “I know but I’m just curious.” You say as you attempt typing with your claw.

Very carefully you manage to type with your Claw and you look on the computer. “Let’s see you see anything we might find interesting... Maybe what they were doing?” you say as you look. “Ok” Scott says as he then points to a file with the name “Were army” “That should say it.” “Right” You say as you click the file and see a lot of code “Hmmm.” “It’s an encrypted file. They must have decryption software on this computer.” Scott says. “Hmm ok.” You say as you start looking “Pascal Class don’t fail me now.” You look on the computer as Scott looks around. “Here we go.” You say as you find the program and start it up. “This would be useless haha.” You look at Scott as he is holding a pistol. “Haha you think if they were doing this they would beef up security measures.” You reply. “Yeah I would think that.” Scott says thinking “Maybe our size was not what they expected.” “Yeah.” You say as you think Even if they could (air quotes) “Control us” How would they be able to cover it?” “Maybe Night ops.” Scott says “Think about it. Hardly anyone is on the streets at night” “Yeah maybe.” You say looking at the computer “Darn DOS is so slow.” “It looks like windows Vista.” Scott says “XP is a lot better because of the performance. Vista takes up too much RAM.” “Yeah Vista is stupid. It just looks pretty and noting more.” You say as you then scratch your head “We're geeks aren’t we?” “I think so haha” Scott laughs. “Haha well at least there is common ground.” You laugh as you look at the computer “Finally.” You say as you look at the file. Scott puts the pistol down walks over as you read the file.

“What is it?” Scott asks. “Something about Experimental Lycanthropy.” You say as you read on “Looks like they were seeing if an unwilling mind could be controlled since they only had a few trys.” “Oh. So they were going to have a control on us.” Scott says “I may have heard something when I woke up. I had a large headache so I don’t remember what they said” “Same here. But apparently it failed not just for use but whoever else was here.” You say. “So I wonder how though. But I never thought this was possible though” Scott says as he punches his chest. “Well it goes into detail but I can't understand this except it takes a ton of power to pull off.” You say as you read on. “Yeah.” Scott says “That Purple electricity. Dose it mention anything about it?” “Yep” you say as you keep looking “I can't help the feeling that there is some sort of off switch to this.” “What do you mean?” Scott asks.” Well what if the government was to investigate them. I don't think they would take this lightly.” You say as you gesture to yourself and Scott “Especially at this size.” “Your right.” Scott says “I wonder if we can control it?” “I wonder too.” You say as you rub your eyes “This is killing my eyes having to squint like this.” “I might try transforming back.” Scott says as he closes his eyes. You watch Scott when…
1311111111.title: Answers

choices: You and Scott decide to look around.
13111111111.content:
You watch as purple electricity starts to emanate from Scott and he starts to change. “Whoa.” You say as you watch Scott change into a human and his clothing reforms on him. “Am I human again?” Scott asks as he opens his eyes. “Yes.” You say as you kneel down. “We may be able to go home after all.” Scott says. “Maybe.” You reply and just then you hear a car park outside “Uh oh.” Just then 6 troopers in black run into the warehouse. Scott grabs a pistol and points it at them. “Surrender and you will be unharmed.” One of the men says. “What’s going on?” you ask. “We are part of an organization called Lycans return. Do you surrender?” Another man asks. “What will you do if I do?” you ask? “We can guarantee your safety and you will be given a new life.” “Lycan Return is the group who runs this operation.” Scott whispers as he looks at the computer. You glare at them “Follow my lead.” You whisper as you lower your guard and scan the room “What now?” “You come with us.” One of the men says “Go into your human form.” You then notice a metal plate and you get an idea. “Ok I ahh.” Say as you take a deep breath “Ahhhh Choooo!” You blow over the Troopers and you grab the metal plate. “Get ready!” you say as you use the plate as a wall to cover you and Scott. Scott takes the pistol as peeks around and takes a shot. “Right between the eyes!” Scott says as he ducks back behind cover. “Ok.” You say as you peek around. Two troopers with assault rifles start to shooting at you. “Gah!” you say as you duck back behind cover. “Grrrrr…” Scott growls. “Scott?” you ask in concern. Scott then dashes from behind cover and you hear him shout “Feel the blood rage!” You hear several gun shots and then silence.

“Oh no… did they get him?” you mumble as you look to check. “W-wow.” You saw as you notice Scott is standing and all the troopers are dead. “I have no clue how I did that?” Scott says. You set the metal plate to the side and you close your eyes. “Must have been something they did.” You say as you try changing back. “I don’t know.” Scott says “I felt a power inside me. It felt like everything was slowing down.” You then transform back to normal and your clothes reform. “Well we should get out of here.” “Wait. I just had a thought.” Scott says “They know who we are. We should probably stay here.” “I guess you’re right.” You say as you scratch your head. “I am just thinking because they could come after our family.” Scott says “They probably have been gathering intelligence on us. If we go back it could be an excuse for them to use our family as leverage.” “Couldn’t they do that anyway?” you ask. “They probably wouldn't want to risk exposure unless we are there.” Scott says as he looks around “How much do you think this is worth?” “Probably a lot for the right person.” You reply as you look around. “Yeah.” We are probably worth thousands now. Maybe even hundreds of thousands.” Scott says. “So I’m guessing they will keep after us.” You say thinking “Probably use any means to get us.” “Yes we will have be ready.” Scott says. Then…
13111111111.title: Lycans Return

131111111111.content: Scott walks over and starts looking in a desk drawer. “What are you looking for?” you ask. “Don’t know.” Scott says as he looks trough the drawer “Just salvage… yay.” He says as he finds some pistol magazines. “Hmm.” You say as you walk up to the troopers and gather the guns “Might as well keep these handy.” “Yeah. Defense never hurts.” Scott says as he keeps looking. “Hmm, how should we carry these?” You ask holding all of the guns. Scott shrugs and says “Maybe we should get a jacket or something.” “Hmm ok.” You say as you spot something on one of the troopers and pick it up cringing “Eww what is this?” “That’s an ammo clip.” Scott says looking over at you “Looks like it’s for a sniper rifle.” “Ok then.” You say as you look for more clips. The sight of the dead bodies makes you sick to your stomach but you carefully gather more clips. You then take the guns over to a table and set them down when you notice Scott thinking. “Something up?” you ask. “Just thinking about stuff.” Scott says “Who are these people & what are they planning. But I get the feeling that the less we know the better.” “Yeah I guess so.” You say as you run to the hanger door and look outside “Hmm.” “I guess we will just have to survive.” Scott says following you “Do you want to go for a swim?” “That sounds fun.” You say as you look around. “Are you ok?” Scott asks. “Just a bit cautious.” You reply. “Ok” Scott says. Purple electricity appears on Scott and he then changes into Wereshark form. “Wow” you mumble looking up at Scott. Scott then dives into the water and makes a huge splash. You laugh at this and watch. “Hahaha are you going to join the shark in the water?” Scott asks peeking out of the water. “Haha I might.” You say as you walk to the edge of the water. You start to see purple electricity on your body as you start to change to your werewolf form. “Here I go.” You say as you jump into the water only for you to come up shouting “COLD!!” “Hahahaha” Scott laughing as he swims to you. “Cold cold cold very cold.” You say half laughing. “Haha it’s not cold to me.” Scott laughs. “Haha I wouldn't doubt that. You’re a shark this is your element.” You say as you adjust to the water. “Haha I suppose.” Scott says as he splashes you. “Haha hey.” you say as you splash him back. Scott then dives under the water and you look down. “Hmm.” Just then you feel yourself getting splashed from behind “Haha Hey!” “Haha Attack of Scott.” Scott says as he makes a huge splash with his tail. “Haha hey!” you laugh. “Haha that was fun.” Scott says as he climbs out of the water. “Haha yeah.” You say as you climb out. You instinctively shake the water off and your fur poofs out. “Donald…” Scott says giggling “Your fur looks fluffy.” “So it is.” You say as you look at yourself. “Haha You’re so soft and fluffy.” Scott laughs as he feels your arm. “Haha yeah” you laugh. Just then you hear Scott’s stomach growls. “I wonder what time is it?” Scott asks. “Sounds like we need to find some food.” You reply. “Yeah I think so.” Scott says “I think we should go get some food. We may have to steal it though.” Hearing this you look to the ground and have a worried look on your face. “It’s the only way.” Scott says “Going out in the day would be like a target on us.” “I know, but it doesn’t feel right.” You reply. “It is the only way.” Scott says “The only other way is… let’s not say it.” You cringe at what Scott was hinting at. “I know…” You say as you sit down “Just don’t to become a convict in the process.” “I know…” Scott replies “But it’s the only way we can survive.” “’sigh’ why did it have to be us.” You say as you clench your fist in anger “It’s not fair!!!” “I know…” Scott replies “But; let’s just get something to eat then worry about it. “Ok” you say as you calm down. “Please forgive me.” You mumble to yourself almost on the verge of tears. “Let’s go.” Scott says as he walks to the exit of the docks. You follow him slowly as you don’t feel right about this whole thing. Then…
131111111111.title: You and Scott decide to look around.

choices: You and Scott get to the docks fine
1311111111111.content:
You and Scott walk into town and look around. “This looks the part of town I lived in.” Scott says. “Oh.” You say following. “Let’s not worry.” Scott says “We just get something to eat then get back to the docks.” “Ok.” You reply. You and Scott look at a house that is about Scott’s size. “Our size makes us seem like giants.” Scott says. “Yeah it does.” You comment. “I know where a small shop is we can go to.” Scott says as he walks down the street. “Ok” you say following Scott. You and Scott keep walking till you come across a small convenience store. “Here it is.” Scott says as he walks around to the back of the store. You follow Scott to the back entrance of the store. Scott then grabs the door handle and rips it out quickly. “Ok let’s go in.” Scott says as he changes into human form and walks inside. “Alright.” You say as you change back to human form and follow him inside. You see tons of shelves of food. “I might get some chips. Do you want some?” Scott asks walking up to one of the shelves. “Umm sure…” you reply nervously. Scott walks up to a shelf and grabs some bags of chips and tossing you a bag. “Thanks.” You say as you catch the bag. “You’re welcome.” Scott says as he opens his bag of chips and starts eating. You open your bag and start eating.

“Hmmm…” you say feeling weird. “What is it?” Scott asks. “I’m not sure…” you say. Just then your eyes open wide and your vision seems to glow blue. “What the?” Scott says as he steps back a bit. You look towards the back door and you detect someone is outside. “Get down!” you whisper as you grab Scott and duck under the counter. “Looks like they came though here.” You hear someone say. You peek around and you notice two troopers from Lycans Return looking around the store. “How did you know?” Scott whispers. “I don’t know?” you whisper “My vision turned blue and I could sense them approaching.” You watch them carefully as they seem to be looking away from where you’re hiding. Your eyes open wide again and you see glowing points on the trooper’s neck. “Donald?” Scott whispers as he rubs your shoulder causing you to shake off the effect. “I think I saw something.” You whisper “I wonder… Cover me.” you whisper as you crawl from cover and sneak towards them. “We better get going.” One of the men says looking out the window “If the cops catch us we’re going to jail.” “Well we still need to check.” The men not noticing you sneak up behind him “We’ll get out before the fuzz gets here.” Just then you cover the trooper’s mouth and press a point on his neck causing him to fall unconscious. You catch his body and drag him behind the shelves and duck down to hide. “You say something?” you here the other person say “You better not be pulling a joke on me.” Then you head the sound of a glass bottle breaking and the man hitting the floor. “Phew, that was close.” You say as you stand up. “Yep. Let’s just get some food and head back to the ware house.” Scott says “Grab some shopping bags and load them with food.”

“Ok.” You say as you grab a bag “wait” you then go to one of the troopers. “What?” Scott asks. You then pull out a wallet full of money. “They did this to us, they might as well pay.” You say as you then start gathering food. “Ok” Scott says as he grabs a bag and starts grabbing food “I like coffee.” He says in a cheery tone. “Haha ok.” You say as you then grab some chips “mmmm yummy.” “Haha. Do you want a certain type of drink?” Scott asks. “Hmm any good sodas over there?” you ask wile grabbing more food. “There is Pepsi Max and some lemonade.” Scott replies. “Mmm Pepsi” you say in a goofy way. “Haha ok.” Scott says grabbing the soda and putting it in the bag. “Haha anything you want me to grab?” you ask. “I don’t know.” Scott replies “Anything that stands out?” “Hmm.” You say looking and finding some candy “What Candy you like?” “I don’t really have an interest in sweets.” Scott says. “Ok” You reply as you look around and spot some cup of noodles “There’s some noodles over here.” “Ooo Noodles.” Scott says “I love the curry flavor especially.” “Haha ok.” You say as you grab some noodles (Making sure to grab some Curry kind) “Got a lot of food here.” “I got a fair amount of drink here too. I think we should go.” Scott says as he goes to the back door. “Ok.” You say as you go to the counter. You dump out the money and leave it there to cover the food (Keeping some left over cash just in case.) “Thanks for paying for our groceries guys.” You jokingly say to the unconscious troopers “Say hi to the cops for us.” You then follow Scott out. Then…
1311111111111.title: A bit of "Shopping"

14.content:
Name: Stephen Williams
Age: 17
Height 5 feet 9 inch
Gender: Male
Interests: Animals, Video Games, Movies and Music
Personality: Courious, Eager to help his friends, lightfooted

Were form: Weretiger
Height: 13 feet 4 inch
Ability: Ferocity - Strength is increased alot
14.title: Stephen Williams

141.content: Your at the tiger display at the zoo, not because you wanted to see the tigers but to help out a friend, he meant to come to the zoo after school to take a picture of tigers for his biology homework. Due to unforseen cercomstances, he's been sent to detention and had to go home afterwards to do his homework, so he asks you to take the picture for him. You were talking to him on your iPhone "I'm at the tiger exhibit right now Greg." He says "Good, take a picture of them and send it to me via email." Greg said. I pressed the home button on my iPhone and touches the camera app, zoomed in to the tigers and took a picture of it, and chose the email option, I chose Greg's email address and sent it out. I went back to the phone app "Okey, picture taken and sent." I said, Greg said "Let me check," after a minute, "Ahh, thanks Steve. You're a real lifesaver." "No problem," I said, "I'll see you in school tomorrow." We both hung up and I made my way to the exit to catch the bus home. On the way
141.title: A favor for a friend

1411.content:
You got off the bus and walk up the street towards your house, then you felt a sharp pain on your back, you pull out a tranquilizer dart, felt groggy and collapsed to the ground. Before you blacked out, you saw to men sporting black. Then lights out.

You woke up with a splitting head, you heard voices and you couldn't make it out because of your headache. You saw two scientists having a conversation about something, you then tried to grab your phone but it's gone. It must've been taken when I was knocked out. You tried to grab their attention but they seemed to ignore you looking around you see that your...
1411.title: Something Happens

14111.content: You see that your in a wierd holding cell in what appears to be a makeshift lab. The cell is just like a standard jail cell, 8 feet from the floor to the roof. The room outside the cell is quite different, machinery all around with a high ceiling. there are four tesla coils attached to each corner of the cell to the machinery, but due to your headache, you couldn't make out the top of the machinery but it's clear that the room was once a warehouse with two hanger doors, you see one of the scientists at a computer terminal, while the other seems to have a discussion on what to do to me. "Uh, pardon me?" You say, they either didn't hear you or ignoring you. You then raised your voice and one of the scientists said "Do you mind? We're busy." You sit down and remain still. "Ooh, my father isn't gonna believe this." You think to yourself.
14111.title: In a wierd holding cell

choices: You make a break for it
141111.content:
I just sit in my cell pondering on how to get out, "Who are these jokers, and what are they planning to do to me?" You think to yourself. suddenly one of the scientists says "A-ha, I believe I've got it!" "Are you sure?" The other one said, "Most defently." The first one said, he typed something in the console and said "Initiating program." Suddenly the tesla coils began to glow with purple electricity, aussenly my headace intensified. I thought my head was about to explode, orange fur began to sprout from your skin, starting from your arms then your whole body, you feel something growing from your tailbone, a feline tail then your covered with black stripes over the orange fur. Padding begins to develope on your hands and feet alone with extenable claws. Your head begins to swell as your ears gets slightly rounded at the top of your head, you felt your face grow into a feline muzzle and fangs replace your teeth, you then grow bigger, until your cramped in the cell, you resemble one of the tigers from Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus except your over 13 feet big. "What's going on, what are you planning to do to me?" You ask in a gruff voice. "We made you better." one of the scientists said, "Will you fight for us?" the other one asked "You turn me into a tiger monster, and expect me to fight for you!?" You gruffed and then you chuckled and gruffed "Dream on!" They begin to whisper to each other and then.









'
141111.title: Stephen the weretiger

1411111.content: As they whisper, "Time to get out of here." You think, Lookinf over your cage, you then got a wild idea on how. You then grabbed the cell bars and attempt to rip the cage from floor, One of the scientists spot you. "Hey! What do you think your doing!?" The cell finally gave way as two of the tesla coils start to spark as they were suddenly disconnected from the cage. "Stop that!" The scientist yelled. He tried to grab my hand but I grabbed him by his shirt and pulled him towards the bars, with an audible clang, he's knocked out. The other one picked up the radio and said "This is Feline cell. we are having a security breach with... All the other cells have had breaches too!?" As I free myself from the cage, he grabbed a cattleprod, I grabbed it as he was about to use it and snapped it in two, He then tried to punch me but I grabbed him by the throat and throw him on the floor in a wresting style chokeslam, knocking him out. "*humph* amateur." You mutter as you head out the hanger doors.
1411111.title: You make a break for it

choices: You leave the docks, despite your appearance
14111111.content: You head outside from the hanger, and you look around. Your in some kind of warehouse complex long abandoned by the docks. Fearing that the place maybe patrolled by guards, you climb a neighboring warehouse with a grace of a cat, you see your new appearance from it's solar panels. "I can't go home looking like this." You say to yourself, "Even if I make my way out of this complex, I'll be feared by the public." You lie down on the roof listening to the surf calm you, then..
14111111.title: Outside

choices: You enter the warehouse via skylight
141111111.content: You look over the side of the roof to see if the coast is clear but you see something that caught your attention, a marine iguana around your size by the side of the docks, and it sees you as well. Just before you got off the roof of the warehouse you hear engine of an appoaching vehicle, and see a SUV with a insignia on the hood of it, a head of a howling wolf. Then it stops between the warehouse and the docks and two men get out "I thought I saw something by the water." One said "I saw something on the roof of the warehouse." said the other "Hurry up and investigate, it could be those escaped test subjects." said a 3rd. inside the car. You quickly go back to the center of the roof and out of eyesight from the guards. "Great, mustn't get caught. How do I get out of this situation?"
141111111.title: Between a rock and a hard place

1411111111.content: As you rush from the edge of the roof, you spot a akylight, "Better get inside quickly." You say to yourself, you manage to pry it open, despite that is being held by springs. Just as you squeeze into the skylight, a seagull lands on the roof. I land on the floor, I looked around and see that this one seems to be just a warehouse, no cell and no machinery. I made my way towards the window keeping myself out of sight, "False alarm," said one of the guards, "It's only a seagull." "Same here," the second one said "Just a dolphin." The man inside said "Get in quickly, we're needed in one of the other labs. Two of the escaped subjects are reported there." You hear doors close and the sound of the SUV speeding out. You breath a sigh of relief and then wonder how many are they're of us total, first it's that marine iguana you saw outside then two more you overhear the guards say. Looking around and you see something out of place, if this warehouse is abandoned, then how come there's control panel next to one of the doors. You study the panel it's got to be state of the art, 12 button touchpad, 5 digit readout.
1411111111.title: You enter the warehouse via skylight

choices: You alert the guards as you escape
14111111111.content: You try to touch the combination lock panel but your claws are too big, you fear you may damage it and unable to get in. "I wish I was human once more." You say as you think of what you used to look like, then you felt electricity surging through your body "Wha?" You think, you felt yourself shrink and your clothes reform, before you know it your back human. "Well that's easier then I thought." You say to yourself as you look at yourself then you walk to the panel "Let's see, sense I'm a weretiger, then the topic must be lycanthropy." You input the code 5-9-2-2-6, (LYCAN in phone code) The panel blnks CODE ACCEPTED as you hear the door unlock, you enter an office with a HP e9300z computer, you sit down in front of it, you examine the system. Windows 7 Ultimate and you examine a file marked 'were army' and you find the contents unpleasent, not only does the wallpaper have the same insignia from the SUV, but the file indecates the name Lycan Returns "Sounds like a follow up to the Underworld series." you comment. According to the file, it's some shadow organazation conducting experiments on lycanthropy but it has no record for who the mastermind is behind all this. You close the file and see the icon security cams, you click on it and sees multiple videos of different but one video marked Aqua caught your interest, it shows guards being pistol whipped by "Is that Scott from School?" You say but he's moving so fast your eyes hardly keep up "Wow, is that results of the experiments? I better not get him angry." You comment, You find a blank CD-ROM and find the file called experiments and burned them onto the CD, You pick up the CD, now that I have evidence. Time to blow this pop stand.
14111111111.title: Human once more

choices: You find the rest in town
141111111111.content: With evidence in hand, it's time to leave. So you leave the office, transform back into your weretiger form and leave via skylight. Looking on, you see that you're not the only one taking his leave, you see the marine iguana taking a swim, and in a distance you see two more making a swim, a shark and a wolf. You decide to make some other exit and you spot it, a forest path so you make a run accross, jumping from roof to roof and a daring leap, clearing the fence. Unfortunatly there was a guard on duty by one of the warehouses in the corner. You hear a siren wail and hear "Attention all guards, one of the experiments is escaping. North of the complex. Recapture him at all costs." In a road ahead there's another SUV with the same Lycan insignia as the one you saw earlier, you turn to the trees and it seems to be following you. "Oh no, I have to get away." you think. You manage to reach the forest but your too big to fit between the trees and end up knocking down one, then you got an idea. You picked up the fallen tree and tossed it towards the SUV like a spear, it hits it's hood. causing the knocking the vehicle's engine off. You quickly went back to human form and enter the forest, You hear the doors open then close. You hear the guards yell "You think that's goning to stop us, think again." You have to be tricky with these guys. You look around and see many things to take down the guards. You see a cave and carefully look inside and see a sleeping bear. You leave the cave quietly and quicly hide behind a tree near the cave. Two of the guards comes in "Might as well give up, you can't escape from us." You manage to throw your voice in the cave and say "Oh yeah? I'm sure going to try." One of the guards points to the cave while the other one says "Not today!" they rush in and you hear the bear growl in anger and the two men yell the two men ran out tripped on a rock and knock themselves out. "Good thing Greg taught me ventriloquism." You go to anther part of the forest and climbed the tree with one branch above another. The other two guards come in and stopped below you where you kick one of the branches loose "BOMBS AWAY!" You yell the two guards looked up as the heavy branch lands right on top of them. Knocking them out. You go into a clearing where you hear buzzing, you look up and see a hornets nest on one of the trees. You hear the last two guards coming "As soon as we capture this one, we need to find the rest of the experiments, they too are reported missing." "We'll search the town close by." You quickly hide and picked up a rock as the two guards comes in, you toss the rock at the hornets nest, it falls and the hornets soon are all over the guards, they yell in pain as they are stung. The ran in madness and ran right into a tree. Knocking themselves out. Your soon back at the SUV with all 6 guards, tied with vines. and gagged with pinecones. You hear your stomech growl, "Whoa, I sure worked up an appitite." You check the SUV and you find a bag in the back, opening the bag you find hamburgers, about a dozen of them. "Ooh, just what the doctor ordered." Then you have second thoughts, what about the rest? I'm sure they could be hungrey too.
141111111111.title: A not so great escape

1411111111112.content: You walked down the road with bag of burgers in hand and a grin in your face, you see a quaint little town and head towards it, perhapse they have a store. You could use a bag of chips and a Pepsi with your burgers. But as you approach the town, something strange happens, your vision suddenly turns blue. You blink and shake your head trying to get your vision normal. "Wha? That's strange." You say out loud. You suddenly feel something wrap around one of your ankles and then suddenly your hanging upside down from a nearby tree "Well well, look what we caught." You hear a voice say, looking down, one of the guards looks at you with a menacing grin. "One down, three to go." he says. A chirp from a device is heard from his belt. He picks up his two-way radio "Report." He says in it. A voice says "Bravo team here, spotted two entering the convenience store." The guard says "Have two troopers follow them. But be careful, we're wanted men." The voice says "So noted, Bravo team out." As the guard puts away his radio, I said "So, you guys are nothing but criminals. "So we are," he said, "do you think that we'll ever let you go to tell anyone? Forget it." He yells out "Jameson! Hunter! Get the cage!" "Yes Commander. " said another voice, two more guards wheel in a cage and place is under me where I was lowered into it and then locked in. The commander picks up the bag of burgers I dropped and the DVD that fell out of my pocket "What's this?" He says "Stealing our lunch is one thing, but hacking our computer is another. You're really in trouble now." I was weeled up the road I spotted one of their SUVs but it's being hoised up by a tow truck, the commander then goes to the towtruck operator "Hey! This is our car!" The man points to a sign: No Parking, Tow Away Zone. "Can't you read that?" The commander looks at Jameson in which he says "That sign wasn't there when I parked it." The commander takes out his wallet "How much do I owe?" The man said "$3500.00, you know the drill. Pay at the police station. Not me gringo." as the commander argues with the towtruck operator, I studied the sign and noticed that the ground at the base was freshly dug up, which means the sign was recently planted. I don't know who did it, but I do admire the prankster's work. As the towtruck drives away with the SUV in tow. The commander says "Looks like whe have to go to the wharf, there's a boat there big enough to carry our cargo. We'll go by water." As I was wheeled towards the river, I decided to make things harder for them by transforming into my tiger form. Hunter, Jameson and the commander grunted as the cage became heavier, 5 minutes later we arive at a small dock where a tugboat is tied up to it. All three guards sat down near a bench "Bad enough to loose transportation but lugging a thousand pound tiger?" The commander says "You guys need to work out more, I thought you millatary types are always in shape." The commander says "I'll get the burgers out, we work up quite an appitite." Then...
1411111111112.title: The captor gets pranked

15.content: EDIT: I cleared all the names to prevent a chapter build up
15.title: Other

151.content:
Name: Amanda Franken
Age: 18
Height: 5'3
Gender: Female
Interests: Science fiction, Fantasy, Animals
Personality: A bit of a loner with attitude.

Were Form: WereRattlesnake
Height: 8'2
Ability: Heat sensing vision
151.title: Amanda Franken

1511.content:
Amanda was at the zoo with her family, Amanda loved animals, of all shapes and sizes it didn't matter what kind she just loved them all! In fact she liked animals more then she liked most people.

Currently she was at the reptile house with her younger sister,Amanda was gazing intently on a Diamondback Rattlesnake...She sighed

"I wonder if this animals really like living in captivity." She sighed, she turned out of the reptile house, it was time to go home
1511.title: Nightmare is going to begin

choices: She wakes up in a prison cell
She wakes up in a training area
15111.content:
Amanda woke up in a strange sort of place, she had no idea how she got there, it seemed like...Everything was just fine, she was coming home from the zoo with her family, then she wakes up tied to an operating bed, with a bunch of strange folks looking at her

"What am I doing here?" Amanda asked trying not to sound too nervous

"You have been chosen because you have unique genetic properties." A man in scientist garb said "We are here to bring forth those latent quarities in extraordinary human beings."

"What are you talking about?" Amanda said "I'm not extraordinary at all! I'm just a kid!"

"We shall see." The Scientist said as he filled a syringe "I get the sense you are very snake-like therefore I will transform you into Crotalus adamanteus the Eastern Diamondback Rattlesnake!"

Before Amanda could say anything else, she felt herself transforming, she felt her legs fusing into a long scaly tail, she heard a a rattle start to shake, she felt her face become a muzzle.

Then she blacked out
15111.title: What happened

choices: Try to go back to sleep
151111.content:
Amanda woke up with a throbbing headache, she rubbed her head and realized something was different...She had no hair! Amanda looked around she was in a dark, dank dingy cell, there were two bowls, one of food, one of water, the food bowl looked like it contained nothing but raw meat.

Amanda looked at herself, she had arms but no legs, instead of legs, she had a long scaly tail with a rattle on the end.

She looked at her hand, it seemed she lost two fingers from each hand so now she had three fingers with long claws on each hand.

She felt strange, kind of sick, her headache wasn't helping matters much, Amanda hoped this would all turn out to be a bad dream that she would wake up from.

She heard a voice in the distance "Hello! Is someone there?"
151111.title: Amanda the Wererattlesnake

1511111.content:
Amanda knew that voice sounded distressed, she had to locate it, but how?

"I am more slender and flexible then I was when I was a human."Amanda said in slithery kind of voice "Maybe I can just squeeze through the bars."

Amanda wedged her flat head and slender neck through the bars, she tried desperately to squeeze her shoulders through.

"Don't even think about it!" Snapped a female scientist, she fired some kind of ray gun at Amanda, Amanda felt a surge of pain go through her, but then the pain subsided and became a ticklish sensation.

Amanda giggled and laughed, her voice became more high pitched, that's when she realized it.

'I'm getting smaller!' She thought in horror.

She shrank in size to height of a six year old, now she was smaller, she fell through the bars of the cage and landed at the feet of the woman scientist

"Thanks for making my escape easier." Amanda said in a squeaky voice

Her hand flew to her mouth

"What happened to my voice?!" She gasped horrified

"It's my latest device." The Scientist smirked "It is a deaging ray or a 'cubifier' as I like to call it, it reduces an adult creature to a child, as you can see your now just a six year old snakeling now that you are a mere child you are no threat to..."

Tired of the yammering, Amanda bit the scientist on her ankle sending a buttload of poison into her system

"Didn't anyone tell you baby snakes are even more poisonous then adults?" Amanda hissed, her rattle going back on forth "I may be just a kid but I've still got my smarts!"

Amanda saw a large hole in the ground, she was small enough to go through it
1511111.title: Trapped...in Cub Form.

15111111.content:
In the heat of the moment, Amanda lunged her now smaller snake body and dove into the hole.

Her limber snake form seemed perfect for traveling in tunnels she just slithered on her belly, the cool dark air was pleasant and made her feel energized.

"Stupid scientist..." Amanda hissed rolling the S when she spoke "Making me a little kid, now I'll have to go through puberty all over again!"

A scent caught Amanda's sensitive nose, she flicked her tongue to smell it better

"Salt water." Amanda said "I must be near the sea!"

She slithered a bit quicker, hoping she would she the sun and smell fresh air soon.

She finds...
15111111.title: Escape

151111112.content: Has Amanda reached her new home as a were-creature?
151111112.title: New home?

1553.content: Here's some more character start points, for those who wish to create.
1553.title: More start points.

info.brief_description: Someone is trying to make an army of Were creatures. Minds cant be shaped though...
info.description:
Someone is planning to make an army of super werecreatures. These people have been trying to get the technology for the experiment to work. It has not worked... until now. But they only have enough power for a few people. They chose to abduct people who are in their teens to brainwash for an army. But is it really possible to shape a mind?


Notes:
1. The werecreatures are roughly 12 - 14 ft tall. But their human form remains at normal.
2. This is an abduction sort of interactive. You can escape or join the people that transform you.
3. Keep it 13+
